name: Pirate Treasure Map Runner
description:
Fun, colorful and simple gameplay with different locations. You are now а young pirate named Kelton in pursuit of treasure.

Game features:
- Simple one-touch control.
- Circular rotation of the terrain.
- Running on islands, Sailing the sea, Flying a hot-air balloon and driving a Cart in a cave.
- Fight with others pirates and angry animals.
- Different 3D characters with individual animations.
- Play for FREE
